QuestData.Title: Lok'lira's Parting Gift
QuestData.Description: You've been a great ally, $n. Now comes your true test. You will need skill, courage and a little luck.$B$B<Lok'lira attaches a thin strand of hair to yours.>$B$BYou cannot fail now sister. Speak to Gretta the Arbiter. She'll see you on your way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gretta the Arbiter in Brunnhildar Village.
QuestData.RewardText: Are you ready to ride, sister? There is no coming back.
